audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - University of Michigan Men's Glee Club & Indiana University Singing Hoosiers Combined Concert - 1958 November 15
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: University of Michigan. Men's Glee Club
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).
audio_item.dc.rights.copyright: This recording may be protected by copyright law. audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 16] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Tape 1 of 2; Indiana Hoosiers sing: With a Song in My Heart For You, Dream While You're Feeling Blue, Candy Dancer's Ball, More, I Cannot Wish You, Graduation Days, Manhattan Towers; I Believe; My Fair Lady. Michigan Glee Club performs: Laudes Atque Carmina; Invocation of Orpheus; Come My Beloved; To The Women; The Omnipotence; There is a Balm in Gilead; Eileen; We Three; Lullaby of Birdland; Luck be a Lady. Selections by the Friars of Michigan Songs: Tis of Michigan We Sing; A Toast To Michigan, I Wanna Go Back To Michigan, I'll Never Forget My College Days, Featuring the Midnight Sons; The Old Friars Song, Presentation to Alumni of Outstanding Achievement Awards by President Harlan Hatcher, Drink, Drink, Joy Rules the Day; Goddess of the Inland Seas; Hymn, Written Especially for our Centennial; The Victors; The Alma Maters - Hail to Old I.U., The Yellow and Blue.
